public ref class Fonts abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides enumeration support for and objects.

span.span: Provides enumeration support for and objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Eine Schriftfamilie ist ein Satz von Schriftarten der gleichen Schriftart, z. B. Arial, jedoch unterschiedliche Funktionen.A font family is a set of fonts that have the same typeface, such as Arial, but that differ in features. Features zählen , z. B. kursiv und , wie z. B. fett dargestellt.These feature differences include , such as italic, and , such as bold. ![Schriftarten](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "Schriftarten")![Fonts](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "Fonts") Beispiel für Schriftarten, die Familie "Times New Roman" angehörenExample of typefaces that are "Times New Roman" font family members

[!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontsSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontFamilySnippets.xaml.cs#fontssnippet1)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontsSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontfamilysnippets.xaml.vb#fontssnippet1)] Zum Zurückgeben der Auflistung der Objekte in einer Anwendung Ressourcen, verwenden Sie die "Pack://application" [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] Notation, die im folgenden Beispiel gezeigt.To return the collection of objects in an application's resources, use the "pack://application" [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] notation shown in the following example.
